verses.verse: "So it shall be when <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> things <S%H1697><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> upon you, the blessing <S%H1293><s%> and the curse <S%H7045><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, and you call <S%H7725><s%> [them] to mind <S%H3824><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has banished <S%H5080><s%> you,

and you return <S%H7725><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> and obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> Him with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and soul <S%H5315><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that I command <S%H6680><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> you and your sons, <S%H1121><s%>

then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will restore <S%H7725><s%> you from captivity, <S%H7622><s%> and have <S%H7355><s%> compassion <S%H7355><s%> on you, and will gather <S%H6908><s%> you again <S%H7725><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has scattered <S%H6327><s%> you.

"If <S%H518><s%> your outcasts <S%H5080><s%> are at the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth, <S%H8064><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will gather <S%H6908><s%> you, and from there <S%H8033><s%> He will bring <S%H3947><s%> you back.

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your fathers possessed, <S%H1><s%> and you shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it; and He will prosper <S%H3423><s%> you and multiply <S%H3190><s%> you more <S%H7235><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> your fathers.

"Moreover the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will circumcise <S%H4135><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and the heart <S%H3824><s%> of your descendants, <S%H2233><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> your soul, <S%H5315><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that you may live. <S%H9132><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will inflict <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> curses <S%H423><s%> on your enemies <S%H340><s%> and on those who hate <S%H8130><s%> you, who <S%H834><s%> persecuted <S%H7291><s%> you.

"And you shall again <S%H7725><s%> obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and observe <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> His commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you today. <S%H3117><s%>

"Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> will prosper <S%H3498><s%> you abundantly <S%H3498><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> in the offspring <S%H6529><s%> of your body <S%H990><s%> and in the offspring <S%H6529><s%> of your cattle <S%H929><s%> and in the produce <S%H6529><s%> of your ground, <S%H127><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will again <S%H7725><s%> rejoice <S%H7797><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you for good, <S%H9185><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as He rejoiced <S%H7797><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> your fathers;

if <S%H3588><s%> you obey <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> His commandments <S%H4687><s%> and His statutes <S%H2708><s%> which are written <S%H3789><s%> in this <S%H2088><s%> book <S%H5612><s%> of the law, <S%H8451><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> you turn <S%H7725><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> and soul. <S%H5315><s%>

"For this <S%H2088><s%> commandment <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you today <S%H3117><s%> is not too <S%H4480><s%> difficult <S%H6381><s%> for you, nor <S%H3808><s%> is it out of reach. <S%H7350><s%>

"It is not in heaven, <S%H8064><s%> that you should say, <S%H559><s%> 'Who <S%H4310><s%> will go <S%H5927><s%> up to heaven <S%H8064><s%> for us to get <S%H3947><s%> it for us and make us hear <S%H8085><s%> it, that we may observe <S%H6213><s%> it?'

"Nor <S%H3808><s%> is it beyond <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5676><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> that you should say, <S%H559><s%> 'Who <S%H4310><s%> will cross <S%H5674><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> for us to get <S%H3947><s%> it for us and make us hear <S%H8085><s%> it, that we may observe <S%H6213><s%> it?'
"But the word <S%H1697><s%> is very <S%H3966><s%> near <S%H7138><s%> you, in your mouth <S%H6310><s%> and in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> that you may observe <S%H6213><s%> it.
"See, <S%H7200><s%> I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you today <S%H3117><s%> life <S%H9132><s%> and prosperity, <S%H9185><s%> and death <S%H4194><s%> and adversity; <S%H9563><s%>

in that I command <S%H6680><s%> you today <S%H3117><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in His ways <S%H1870><s%> and to keep <S%H8104><s%> His commandments <S%H4687><s%> and His statutes <S%H2708><s%> and His judgments, <S%H4941><s%> that you may live <S%H2421><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> may bless <S%H1288><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you are entering <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

"But if <S%H518><s%> your heart <S%H3824><s%> turns <S%H6437><s%> away <S%H6437><s%> and you will not obey, <S%H8085><s%> but are drawn <S%H5080><s%> away <S%H5080><s%> and worship <S%H7812><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> them,

I declare <S%H5046><s%> to you today <S%H3117><s%> that you shall surely perish. You shall not prolong <S%H6><s%> [your] days <S%H6><s%> in the land <S%H748><s%> where <S%H3117><s%> <S%H127><s%> you are crossing <S%H834><s%> the Jordan <S%H8033><s%> to enter <S%H5674><s%> and possess <S%H3383><s%> it.

"I call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to witness <S%H5749><s%> against you today, <S%H3117><s%> that I have set <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you life <S%H9132><s%> and death, <S%H4194><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> and the curse. <S%H7045><s%> So choose <S%H977><s%> life <S%H9132><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that you may live, <S%H2421><s%> you and your descendants, <S%H2233><s%>

by loving <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> by obeying <S%H8085><s%> His voice, <S%H6963><s%> and by holding <S%H1692><s%> fast <S%H1692><s%> to Him; for this <S%H1931><s%> is your life <S%H9132><s%> and the length <S%H753><s%> of your days, <S%H3117><s%> that you may live <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, to Abraham, <S%H1><s%> Isaac, <S%H85><s%> and Jacob, <S%H3327><s%> to give <S%H3290><s%> them. "
